item.description:
Hello  

I booked Four Tee times due to the growing Waiting List.  The Tee Times are: 10:10, 10:20, 10:40, and 10:50 at Blackstone National Golf Club.  It looks like a great course; the price is $75 which includes a cart and range balls.  The Pro Shop requests showing up at least 1/2 hour before the Tee times.  The Tee times are spread out; please try to show up at the course by 9:45 so we can pair people up and the day begins as smoothly as possible.

** Because there are 16 golfers in this group, my credit card is holding all spots.  As you may know, there's a 24 hour cancellation notice.  If there's a "no-show," my credit card will be charged.  Please do your best to make it to the course...if you can't make it; you can call me at: 617-519-4141.**

With that aside....

Here's the link:  http://www.bngc.net/

See you this weekend.  

Thanks...

Jon

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Blackstone National Golf Club on Sunday, July 29th
